mapper.select: SELECT mc.month_charge_id obj_id,mc.employee_id,emp.employee_name,ea.company_id,mc.ss_month_belong as pay_month,mc.emp_payment_status as is_company_enjoy_advance ,mc.hf_type,(IFNULL(mc.amount,0)-IFNULL(a.amount,0)) as 'pay_amount' FROM hf_month_charge mc INNER JOIN hf_emp_archive ea ON ea.emp_archive_id=mc.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN hf_payment_account pc ON pc.com_account_id=ea.com_account_id INNER JOIN emp_employee emp ON mc.employee_id=emp.employee_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT mc.employee_id,mc.ss_month_belong ,mc.payment_type,mc.amount,mc.hf_type,ea.company_id FROM hf_month_charge mc INNER JOIN hf_emp_archive ea ON ea.emp_archive_id=mc.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN hf_payment_account pc ON pc.com_account_id=ea.com_account_id WHERE pc.is_active=1 AND mc.payment_type in(7,8,9,10) AND mc.hf_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_account_id=#{paymentAccountId})a on a.ss_month_belong=mc.ss_month_belong AND a.employee_id=mc.employee_id AND a.company_id=ea.company_id AND mc.hf_type=a.hf_type WHERE mc.is_active=1 AND mc.payment_type in(1,2,3,4,5,6,11) AND mc.hf_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_account_id=#{paymentAccountId} and (IFNULL(mc.amount,0)-IFNULL(a.amount,0))!=0

SELECT count(1) FROM hf_month_charge mc INNER JOIN hf_emp_archive ea ON ea.emp_archive_id=mc.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN hf_payment_account pc ON pc.com_account_id=ea.com_account_id INNER JOIN emp_employee emp ON mc.employee_id=emp.employee_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT mc.employee_id,mc.ss_month_belong ,mc.payment_type,mc.amount,mc.hf_type FROM hf_month_charge mc INNER JOIN hf_emp_archive ea ON ea.emp_archive_id=mc.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN hf_payment_account pc ON pc.com_account_id=ea.com_account_id WHERE pc.is_active=1 AND mc.payment_type in(7,8,9,10) AND mc.hf_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_account_id=#{paymentAccountId})a on a.ss_month_belong=mc.ss_month_belong AND a.employee_id=mc.employee_id and mc.hf_type=a.hf_type WHERE mc.is_active=1 AND mc.payment_type in(1,2,3,4,5,6,11) AND mc.hf_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_month=#{paymentMonth} AND pc.payment_account_id=#{paymentAccountId} and (IFNULL(mc.amount,0)-IFNULL(a.amount,0))!=0 AND IFNULL(mc.emp_payment_status,0) = 0
